name: Toufeeq Zahid
address: Flate # 313 Block C Marine Drive Clifton Block 2 Karachi
brief_fact: PI K-2532 Toufeeq Zahid of District Noshera Feroz he is performing Namaz-e-Jumma at Muhmmadi Masjid Gulberg Karachi on 23-04-2004 5 unknown accused person come and open fire to PI Toufeeq Zahid, who is seriously injured later on he got Shahdat on the spot.

name: Muhammad Zaman
address: House 4971, Gulshan e Manzdoor L patti Baldia Town
brief_fact: Head Constable No.15504 Muhammad Zaman, posted at Jackson PS Investigation Zone-I, Capital City Police, was killed by unknown persons on 09-12-2009 in the jurisdiction of Chakiwara Police Station.

name: Zakir Hussain
address: Palai Bazudarrah The Butt Khela Dist Mala Kand
brief_fact: Constable Zakir Hussain of PHQ Naval Karachi, deployed for security duty of SSP CTD Ch Aslam Khan, was martyred on 19-09-2011 at a bomb blast.

name: Noor Ul Amin
address: House No 61 Block 11 Frere Family Police Line Karachi
brief_fact: Constable No.21938 Noor-ul-Amin, working in Investigation Wing CTD/CTU Karachi, was killed by unknown armed persons on 20-12-2012 in the jurisdiction of Frere Police Station, District South.

name: Muhammad Zahir Shah
address: House No 706 Sector 8/D Gulzar Colony Korangi Karachi
brief_fact: HC-2766/4819 Muhammad Zahir Shah of Legal Branch CPO Sindh Karachi was targeted by 3 unknown armed persons while on duty delivering a letter from ATC Courts Karachi on 30-04-2014.

name: Muhammad Zahid
address: House No 289/2 Martans Quarter Teen Hatti Karachi
brief_fact: HC-3538 Zahid Khan, Court Muharrar at ATC Jail Complex Central Jail, was killed by unknown criminals near his residence on 10-12-2015.

name: Ghulam Muhammad
address: House No 15/2-A Tunesia Line Karachi No.3
brief_fact: ASI K-14610 Ghulam Muhammad of Artillery Maidan PS investigation South Zone, Karachi, was martyred due to target killing on 23-07-2020 near Cantonment Chowki Mubarak Shaheed Road Cantt Karachi.

name: Abdul Malik
address: Officers Flat F Type D-2 PHQ Gardan
brief_fact: SIP K 3554 Abdul Malik was on his way to Kharadar PS when an unknown vehicle hit him, causing serious injuries that led to his death.
